entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -0.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 9:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 1 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:59 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:59 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Fog patches dissipating late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:59 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
